for Medical Use) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 262 of 2019) are amended by 
substituting for Schedule 1 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Misuse of 
Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of Cannabis for Medical Use) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 505 of 2020)) the following:

title: substituting for Schedule 1 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Misuse of
heading: 3. The Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of Cannabis
text_raw:
3. The Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of Cannabis 

for Medical Use) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: substituting for Schedule 1 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Misuse of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Misuse of Drugs 
(Prescription and Control of Supply of Cannabis for Medical Use) Regulations 
2019 to replace Schedule 1 in order to list certain cannabis products or 
preparations for medical use as “specified controlled drugs”. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and 
Control of Supply of Cannabis for Medical Use) (Amendment) Regulations
